# This file is autogenerated by always_run.py
# Do not edit this file directly

ciso_init_civsoc_global = {
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = ciso_civil_institutions
		target = flag:ciso_ci_tammany_hall
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = ciso_civil_institutions
		target = flag:ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = ciso_civil_institutions
		target = flag:ciso_ci_royal_court
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = ciso_civil_institutions
		target = flag:ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations
	}
	every_state = {
		limit = {
			ciso_state_has_civil_society = yes
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ciso_ci_tammany_hall_organization
			value = 80
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions_organization
			value = 20
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ciso_ci_royal_court_organization
			value = 20
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations_organization
			value = 20
		}
	}
}
